programme.title: Exchange For Love
programme.desc: Amadi the Onowu of a kingdom will do anything to ascend the throne, even if it means killing the crowned prince. But the princes goodwill is about to save him from the disaster ahead.

programme.title: The Invitation
programme.desc: Sochi leaves the love of her life and marries a prince and heir to the throne, but things are about to go bad as the prince will show her the other side of love.

programme.title: The Cat
programme.desc: In a cult, a lady holds a position of endless wealth and greatness, sustained if her son remained unmarried and live with her forever.

programme.title: Flora The Champion
programme.desc: Africa Magic brings you entertainment and compelling stories that speak to the African heart loved by Africa. Watch intriguing stories on AM Epic.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Taking chances on love and forging new connections, hoping for fresh alliances and meaningful relationships.

programme.title: Boundaries
programme.desc: Ama allows Johnson into her home and didnt set boundaries, little did she know that her decision is going to ruin everything she has with her husband.

programme.title: Wrong Wife
programme.desc: Egwitus will not allow Ogechi, her fathers new wife come into the house to become her stepmother because of her suspicions.

programme.title: My Godson
programme.desc: After Smith returns from America, he falls in love with Cindy, unaware that she would strip him of everything he owned. However, Bisola is determined to reveal Cindys true nature.

programme.title: Wusal Taa Daime
programme.desc: Simi gives birth to Gyang at a very young age, all grown, Gyangs father Dagogo wants to have him back. However, Simi is short lived as Gyang struggles to accept Dagogo as his father.

programme.title: Violent King
programme.desc: Igwe Ikenna is denied his throne, and the gods are mad at the king makers. Now he must be crowned king for all to see, but his decisions as a king is about to be questioned.

programme.title: Small Trouble
programme.desc: Agidi, a troublesome village girl, travels to stay with Bridget in the city. This decision is about to destroy Bridgets plan for Henry and make Agidis life better.

programme.title: Heart Of A Friend
programme.desc: Dinma trusts Nkechi, but Nkechi is bent on destroying the relationship between Dinma and her best friend Udala. This is all because a prince loves Dinma more.

programme.title: Royal Hatred
programme.desc: After the death of the second queen, Kambilis mum, the king is also killed. Now, the throne is empty, and a queen must be crowned, the battle of who will wear the crown begins.

programme.title: Heaven
programme.desc: Chukwuebuka is duped after he did all travel out of the country to play for a football club in Europe, this incident takes the life of his mom but Nurse Uju comes to the rescue.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Mmadiya wants her sons to marry from Ajaani. Adanna and Nnanna share an experience.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Tensions heat up in the fall out of Ajaanis invasion. Love blooms even in the chaos, and someone returns victorious.

programme.title: Hand Of Justice
programme.desc: After Igwe Eloke impregnated a young lady, she runs away to a far away land. 25 years later, something strange happens to him.

programme.title: Love At Bay
programme.desc: After countless instances of bullying from Alice, Maya discovers that their single parents have fallen in love. The two girls must navigate their complicated feelings.

programme.title: Emergency Meeting
programme.desc: Henry, a police officer, and Chidi, an armed robber are both in love with the same woman, and a fight for her heart is about to ignite a war that will turn the ghetto upside down.

programme.title: Innocence Between Walls
programme.desc: Dimitri is about to let out all secrets as Mrs. Elizabeth is killed in her apartment and all fingers points to Abigail, Mrs. Elizabeth daughter.

programme.title: Life As It Is
